term.title: ion-free layer

item.text: An interphase in which only non-specifically adsorbed ions are present.

sources.item: PAC, 1983, 55, 1251. 'Interphases in systems of conducting phases (Provisional)' on page 1261 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198355081251)
